text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomadera nijedera loka chara an'yadera antarangarupe grahana karo na; tara anista sadhana karate tomadera theke pascatpada haya na. Tomadera ya klesa deya tara ta bhalobase, tadera mukha theke ghora bidbesa itimadhye nirgata hacche. Ara tadera antare ya lukono ache ta ara'o gurutara. Tomadera jan'ya nirdesabali suspasta karalama, yadi tomara bujhate paro.
